data.title: luxinia v 0.94 - scriptable 3d game engine
data.meta_description: Another bigger release was done. The usual bugfixes and tweaking was done as well as some new samples were introduced.
data.text:
Another bigger release was done. The usual bugfixes and tweaking was done as well as some new samples were introduced. Content wise .3ds, .obj, q3 .bsp conversion is possible now.

While fancy tech is supported, requirements are still fairly low and all demos should run well on GeForce3+

Lua is used entirely for programming the games, it is a simple yet very powerful programming language, that is extremely popular in games.

All demos come with complete sourcecode.

Quake3 level conversion

Interactive Sky demo

Crane Driver physics demo

More info and download here

The engine is free for non-commercial use.

feedback is very welcome
